import React from 'react' import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button" import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async' import { Form, Link, useLocation, useNavigate, useSubmit } from 'react-router-dom' import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container" function SignInScreen() { const submitHandler = useSubmit(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { search } = useLocation(); const redirectInUrl = new URLSearchParams(search).get('redirect'); const redirect = redirectInUrl ? redirectInUrl : '/'; return ( Sign In
